title: [管理|安全]AuthMeBungee —— BC更安全登录[BC]
author: r7mc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 r7mc 于 2018-8-1 04:57 编辑 


AuthMeBungee - BungeeCord更安全的登录方案这是一个BungeeCord插件，需要依赖AuthMeReloaded 5.4.0+
AuthMe向玩家发送一个通讯，如果BungeeCord未收到登录信息，玩家将不能执行任何指令
AutoLogin：如果在多个服务器上安装了AuthMe启用AutoLogin功能玩家跨服将会自动登录


支持 
 -GitHub issue tracker
 -Jenkins (Dev Builds)
 -Discord


需求
 - Java 1.8 +
 - BungeeCord/Waterfall 1.7+
 - 一个安装有AuthMe Reloaded的CraftBukkit/Spigot/Paper/Tacospigot 1.7.10+服务器

安装
1.下载AuthMeBungee
2.将AuthMeBungee.jar加入到BungeeCord的plugins文件夹内
3.确保hooks.bungeecord在AuthMe Reloaded配置中启用
Hooks:
    # Do we need to hook with multiverse for spawn checking?
    multiverse: true
    # 确保该项为true
    bungeecord: true
    # Send player to this BungeeCord server after register/login
    sendPlayerTo: ''
    # Do we need to disable Essentials SocialSpy on join?
    disableSocialSpy: false
    # Do we need to force /motd Essentials command on join?
    useEssentialsMotd: false

4.重启服务器

Angel残魂Sky 发表于 2018-8-1 18:07

AuthMeBungee放入BungeeCord的plugins文件夹后spigot内有什么地 ...
AuthMe该项配置改为：
Hooks:
    # Do we need to hook with multiverse for spawn checking?
    multiverse: true
    # 确保该项为true
    bungeecord: true
    # Send player to this BungeeCord server after register/login
    sendPlayerTo: ''
    # Do we need to disable Essentials SocialSpy on join?
    disableSocialSpy: false
    # Do we need to force /motd Essentials command on join?
    useEssentialsMotd: false
Authentication required.是这个插件的问题吗qwq
